name: Spirit Rescue (Kaggish)
description:
In a land far, far away, mystical creatures and humans are living together in peace. Gifted with powerful magic it is not rare that creatures aid humans in dangerous situations. But even these strong beings need rest and an elite group of people gathered to protect them in their time of slumber. From then on, the Rangers would watch over them. Then, when nobody suspected evil to happen, it struck. Malicious hunters and other vile folk rose and started capturing the peaceful creatures, wanting to exploit them for their selfish plans. Now it is your time, as part of the Rangers to free two captured beings from their tormentors and set them free again. Good luck, Adventurer. 

When completing all the waves, the game is over. But do you wanna continue to play, press the "endless mode" button and continue on as long as you want.

Controls: Walk: WASD 

Shoot: left mouse button 

Charge Attack: right mouse button 

Special Attack 1: press “Q” 

Special Attack 2: press “E”

Pause Game: press "ESC"
